items.title: Install fails for python 3.7 PyPI
items.body:
OS: Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS x86_64
```
⋊> ~ pip3 --version                                                                   00:16:24
pip 19.3.1 from /usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/pip (python 3.7)
```


```
Installing collected packages: wsaccel, trio-websocket
    Running setup.py install for wsaccel ... error
    ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1:
     command: /usr/bin/python3.7 -u -c 'import sys, setuptools, tokenize; sys.argv[0] = '"'"'/tmp/pip-install-1fcnvhse/wsaccel/setup.py'"'"'; __file__='"'"'/tmp/pip-install-1fcnvhse/wsaccel/setup.py'"'"';f=getattr(tokenize, '"'"'open'"'"', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('"'"'\r\n'"'"', '"'"'\n'"'"');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, '"'"'exec'"'"'))' install --record /tmp/pip-record-3m71ecux/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile
         cwd: /tmp/pip-install-1fcnvhse/wsaccel/
    Complete output (17 lines):
    running install
    running build
    running build_py
    creating build
    creating build/lib.linux-x86_64-3.7
    creating build/lib.linux-x86_64-3.7/wsaccel
    copying wsaccel/__init__.py -> build/lib.linux-x86_64-3.7/wsaccel
    running build_ext
    building 'wsaccel.utf8validator' extension
    creating build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7
    creating build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/wsaccel
    x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc -pthread -Wno-unused-result -Wsign-compare -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O2 -Wall -g -fstack-protector-strong -Wformat -Werror=format-security -g -fwrapv -O2 -g -fstack-protector-strong -Wformat -Werror=format-security -Wdate-time -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -fPIC -I/usr/include/python3.7m -c wsaccel/utf8validator.c -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-3.7/wsaccel/utf8validator.o
    wsaccel/utf8validator.c:8:10: fatal error: pyconfig.h: No such file or directory
     #include "pyconfig.h"
              ^~~~~~~~~~~~
    compilation terminated.
    error: command 'x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' failed with exit status 1
    ----------------------------------------
ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1: /usr/bin/python3.7 -u -c 'import sys, setuptools, tokenize; sys.argv[0] = '"'"'/tmp/pip-install-1fcnvhse/wsaccel/setup.py'"'"'; __file__='"'"'/tmp/pip-install-1fcnvhse/wsaccel/setup.py'"'"';f=getattr(tokenize, '"'"'open'"'"', open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace('"'"'\r\n'"'"', '"'"'\n'"'"');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, '"'"'exec'"'"'))' install --record /tmp/pip-record-3m71ecux/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --compile Check the logs for full command output.
```

items.title: Missing 0.6.2 Tag/Release
items.body: Version 0.6.2 is released on PyPi, but there is not a corresponding tag and release here on Github. The last tag/release is 0.6.

items.title: Provide wheels
items.body: In particular on Windows, it would be nice if `wsaccel` published wheels, as that make installation pain free.

items.title: Include tests on pypi release
items.body:
Hi,

Can you please include the test files in the pypi release?

Can you also help me to launch the tests? I launched in the root folder against mater `python -m unittest discover -s tests` (which is not able to find utf8validator and  xormask) and `PYTHONPATH=build/lib.linux-x86_64-2.7 python -m unittest discover -s tests` which doesn't find any tests.

items.title: Incule license file
items.body:
Hi,

Can you please include a license file (both in github and in the pypi release)?

items.title: Memory leak in xormasker
items.body:
It appears as if all of the data i send through my websockets is being held in memory until i restart the process.  

Im using cherrypy server with ws4py.

Im linking a gist of code that can reproduce the issue

https://gist.github.com/nmonroe/5612868

items.title: cannot install 0.6 from pypi source dist
items.body:
`build_ext` fails with error: `wsaccel/utf8validator.pyx: No such file or directory`

the source dist doesn't package the `.pyx` files. a cursory glance looks like this line may be the problem: https://github.com/methane/wsaccel/blob/master/setup.py#L24

```
» pip install wsaccel
Downloading/unpacking wsaccel
  Running setup.py egg_info for package wsaccel

Installing collected packages: wsaccel
  Running setup.py install for wsaccel
    error: wsaccel/utf8validator.pyx: No such file or directory
    Complete output from command /Users/ed/.virtualenvs/main/bin/python -c "import setuptools;__file__='/Users/ed/.virtualenvs/main/build/wsaccel/setup.py';exec(compile(open(__file__).read().replace('\r\n', '\n'), __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /var/folders/c4/5zhnp85j7n35g90110yd3hsr0000gn/T/pip-DXcUq1-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --install-headers /Users/ed/.virtualenvs/main/bin/../include/site/python2.7:
    running install

running build

running build_py

running build_ext

error: wsaccel/utf8validator.pyx: No such file or directory

----------------------------------------
Command /Users/ed/.virtualenvs/main/bin/python -c "import setuptools;__file__='/Users/ed/.virtualenvs/main/build/wsaccel/setup.py';exec(compile(open(__file__).read().replace('\r\n', '\n'), __file__, 'exec'))" install --record /var/folders/c4/5zhnp85j7n35g90110yd3hsr0000gn/T/pip-DXcUq1-record/install-record.txt --single-version-externally-managed --install-headers /Users/ed/.virtualenvs/main/bin/../include/site/python2.7 failed with error code 1 in /Users/ed/.virtualenvs/main/build/wsaccel
Storing complete log in /Users/ed/.pip/pip.log
```

items.title: wsaccel/autobahn validation discrepancy.
items.body:
Hi, I've been playing around with wsaccel (v0.3) after stumbling across cutf8validator this morning, and (perhaps I'm doing something stupid) but wsaccel seems to fail some of the utf8 tests in autobahntestcase where autobahn's built-in validator doesn't:

```
In [1]: from wsaccel import utf8validator

In [2]: v = utf8validator.Utf8Validator()

In [3]: x = "Hello-µ@ßöäüàá-UTF-8!!"  # taken from case 6.2.1

In [4]: v.validate(x)
Out[4]: (False, False, 6, 6)

In [5]: from autobahn import utf8validator

In [6]: v = utf8validator.Utf8Validator()

In [7]: v.validate(x)
Out[7]: (True, True, 29, 29)

In [8]: x.decode('utf8').encode('utf8') == x
Out[8]: True
```

you can see wsaccel.utf8validator's validate() returns False while autobahn.utf8validator's validate() returns True. I can see you're actively working on wsaccel so apologies if this is something you're aware of or working on.

items.title: Will not install from pypi because README.md is not included in sdist
items.body:
when installing from pypi with both pip and easy_install the following error occurs:

```
» pip install cutf8validator
Downloading/unpacking cutf8validator
  Downloading cutf8validator-0.1.tar.gz
  Running setup.py egg_info for package cutf8validator
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 16, in <module>
      File ".../build/cutf8validator/setup.py", line 55, in <module>
        with open('README.md') as f:
    IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'README.md'
    Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "<string>", line 16, in <module>

  File ".../build/cutf8validator/setup.py", line 55, in <module>

    with open('README.md') as f:

IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'README.md'
```

README.md is not included in the source distribution.

items.title: WS performance hotspots
items.body:
Sorry, not an issue actually, but don't know how to contact you otherwise.

This is cool! With minimal effort, substantial performance gain .. even without PyPy.

Actually, there are 2 performance hotspots in Autobahn (and I guess other Python WebSocket implementations as well):

UTF8 validation .. which you just "fixed";)

And WebSocket frame masking/unmasking (https://github.com/tavendo/AutobahnPython/blob/master/autobahn/autobahn/xormasker.py).

The latter could probably also profit significantly from a Cython implementation.
